title: Elon Musk, in a Tweet, Shares Link From Site Known to Publish False News
description: The tweet on Sunday posted an article that made baseless allegations about the attack on House Speaker Nancy Pelosiâ€™s husband.
dc:creator: Kurtis Lee
media:description: In the months since Elon Musk announced he would buy Twitter, questions have been raised about how, or if, he would act to combat misinformation and hate speech on the site.
